title: Weaker import sales drag down sales results at AutoNation
content:
ws Editor 

AutoNation (NYSE:AN) reports retail new vehicle sales fell 5% Y/Y to 31,032 vehicles. Same-store new vehicles sales were down 7% during the year. 

Sales in the domestic segment were up 2% to 10,239 vehicles. 

Import segment sales fell 14% to 14,641. 

Premium luxury segment sales were up 8% to 6,152.
